title: All requested NODEs should contain valid timestamps
gherkin:
Given there exist 5 "<node_type>"s
When the user requests all "<node_type>"s
And for each item the following properties in the response should contain a valid timestamp
  | key        |
  | created_at |
  | updated_at |

Examples:
  | node_type         |
  | COMPANY           |
  | BRAND             |
  | CAR MODEL         |
  | CAR MODEL VARIANT |
  | RACE TRACK        |
  | TRACK LAYOUT      |
  | RACING SERIES     |
  | RACING EVENT      |
  | RACING SESSION    |
  | SESSION RESULT    |
  | LAP TIME          |
  | RACING GAME       |
  | GAMING PLATFORM   |
  | IMAGE             |
